mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tbl ( pro_num, cg_prt_code, cg_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_company, pro_content, pro_uploadpath, pro_img, pro_stock, pro_ok_buy ) VALUES ( seq_product_num.nextval, #{cg_prt_code}, #{cg_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_discount}, #{pro_company}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_uploadpath}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_stock}, #{pro_ok_buy} )
mapper.select: SELECT cg_code, cg_prt_code, cg_name FROM category_tbl WHERE cg_prt_code IS NULL
SELECT cg_code, cg_prt_code, cg_name FROM category_tbl WHERE cg_prt_code = #{cg_code}

SELECT pro_num, cg_prt_code, cg_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_company, pro_content, pro_img, pro_uploadpath, pro_stock, pro_ok_buy, pro_loaddate, pro_updatedate
FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(product_tbl product_tbl_pk) */ rownum rn, pro_num, cg_prt_code, cg_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_company, pro_content, pro_img, pro_uploadpath, pro_stock, pro_ok_buy, pro_loaddate, pro_updatedate FROM product_tbl WHERE
rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) WHERE rn > ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} )

SELECT count(*) FROM product_tbl WHERE
pro_num > 0

SELECT pro_num, cg_prt_code, cg_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_company, pro_content, pro_img, pro_uploadpath, pro_stock, pro_ok_buy, pro_loaddate, pro_updatedate FROM product_tbl WHERE pro_num = #{pro_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_tbl SET cg_prt_code = #{cg_prt_code}, cg_code = #{cg_code}, pro_name = #{pro_name}, pro_price = #{pro_price}, pro_discount = #{pro_discount}, pro_company = #{pro_company}, pro_content = #{pro_content}, pro_img = #{pro_img}, pro_uploadpath = #{pro_uploadpath}, pro_stock = #{pro_stock}, pro_ok_buy = #{pro_ok_buy}, pro_updatedate = sysdate WHERE pro_num = #{pro_num}
